summary.para: These are the global variables for the MainDatabase class
These are the methods used for opening and closing the connection to the sqlite database.
This method is used to retrieve Product table data directly from the sqlite database
This method is used to retrieve CustomerList table data directly from the sqlite database
This Method is used to show either CustomerList or Product tables respectively
This is a method used to add the user controls, to the tab control in the MainDatabase form
This button method returns the user to the menu screen

summary.para:
This is an experimental form, that allows the user to change the colour scheme of the program. There are only two colour themes currently: White and Black. (In future, I would like to add more settings and more colour themes to the program)
Currently, I will not implement the form as it still needs to be worked on and as I said, it is still experimental. After creating a release for the program, I will implement the settings section as a new feature.

summary.para: This is the menu form that holds all of the buttons for each of the seperate forms. When the user clicks on a button the form is hidden (and not closed), and a new instance of another form is created and called.
The CheckIfLoggedIn method checks whether the Logged in getter, is actually set to true or false. If it set to true then the login button is disabled, otherwise the main database button is disabled.
